SELECT 'COST' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY')||LPAD(TB_SM10M01_SQ02.NEXTVAL,4,0) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_SM10M01 ( FILE_TRGT_KEY, CO_CD, COST_NO, ORDRS_NO, ORDRS_CO_CD, SALES_CD, REQ_NO, PCHS_CLNT_CD, COST_DT, PCHS_COST_DIV10, PCHS_COST_DIV20, CURR_CD, EXRATE, COST_AMT, MATR_CD, COST_RMK, ETC_FIELD1, ETC_FIELD2, ETC_FIELD3, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, PAY_DIV, PAY_DIV_DT, PCHS_PMNT_MTD_CD, PCHS_CLMN_DIV_CD, PCHS_CLMN_DAY ) VALUES ( #{fileTrgtKey}, #{coCd}, #{costNo}, #{ordrsNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordrsCoCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pchsClntCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pchsCostDiv10, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pchsCostDiv20, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exrate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costAmt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matrCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costRmk, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcField1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcField2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcField3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{payDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payDivDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pchsPmntMtdCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pchsClmnDivCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pchsClmnDay, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, X.CO_CD, -- 회사코드 FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(X.CO_CD) AS CO_CD_NM, X.ORDRS_NO, -- 수주번호 X.SALES_CD, -- SALES CODE -- DECODE(D.CHK_SAVE_CD, 'PCHSCOSTDIV1030', 'Y', 'N') AS CHK_SAVE_CD, -- 저장형태 일단은 PCHSCOSTDIV1030 CASE WHEN NVL(D.ORDRS_AMT, 0) != 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CHK_SAVE_CD, Y.ORGN_SALES_CD, -- 원천 SALES CODE Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD, -- 고객사 A.CLNT_NM AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM, Y.CLNT_PJT, -- 고객사 PJT FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(Y.CLNT_PJT) AS CLNT_PJT_NM, -- 고객사 PJT명 X.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20, -- 신작구분 FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(X.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20) AS ORDRS_DTL_DIV20_NM, X.PRDT_CD, -- 제품구분 P.PRDT_NM PRDT_CD_NM, X.ITEM_DIV, -- 아이템구분 FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(X.ITEM_DIV) ITEM_DIV_NM, X.EQP_NM -- 설비명 FROM TB_CR02D02 X INNER JOIN TB_CR02M01 Y ON X.CO_CD = Y.CO_CD AND X.ORDRS_NO = Y.ORDRS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM01M01 P ON X.PRDT_CD = P.PRDT_CD --제품마스터 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 A ON Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD = A.CLNT_CD --거래처마스터 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM10D01 D ON X.CO_CD = D.CO_CD AND X.ORDRS_NO = D.ORDRS_NO AND (X.SALES_CD = D.SALES_CD OR (X.SALES_CD IS NULL AND D.SALES_CD IS NULL)) WHERE X.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND X.ORDRS_NO = #{ordrsNo} ) A

/* selectTurnKeySalesCodeList */ SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT X.CO_CD, -- 회사코드 FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(X.CO_CD) AS CO_CD_NM, X.ORDRS_NO, -- 수주번호 X.SALES_CD, -- SALES CODE -- NVL2(D.CHK_SAVE_CD, 'Y', 'N') AS CHK_SAVE_CD, -- 저장형태 일단은 PCHSCOSTDIV1030 CASE WHEN NVL(D.ORDRS_AMT, 0) != 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CHK_SAVE_CD, D.CHK_SAVE_CD AS CHK_SAVE_CD_ORG, Y.ORGN_SALES_CD, -- 원천 SALES CODE Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD, -- 고객사 A.CLNT_NM AS ORDRS_CLNT_NM, Y.CLNT_PJT, -- 고객사 PJT FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(Y.CLNT_PJT) AS CLNT_PJT_NM, -- 고객사 PJT명 X.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20, -- 신작구분 FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(X.ORDRS_DTL_DIV20) AS ORDRS_DTL_DIV20_NM, X.PRDT_CD, -- 제품구분 P.PRDT_NM PRDT_CD_NM, X.ITEM_DIV, -- 아이템구분 FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(X.ITEM_DIV) ITEM_DIV_NM, X.EQP_NM, -- 설비명 X.ORDRS_QTY AS SALES_ORDRS_QTY, D.ORDRS_QTY, D.ORDRS_AMT, D.ORDRS_RMK, X.ORDRS_SEQ -- SALES SEQ FROM TB_CR02D02 X INNER JOIN TB_CR02M01 Y ON X.CO_CD = Y.CO_CD AND X.ORDRS_NO = Y.ORDRS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM01M01 P ON X.PRDT_CD = P.PRDT_CD --제품마스터 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 A ON Y.ORDRS_CLNT_CD = A.CLNT_CD --거래처마스터 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM10D01 D ON X.CO_CD = D.CO_CD AND X.ORDRS_NO = D.ORDRS_NO AND (X.SALES_CD = D.SALES_CD OR (X.SALES_CD IS NULL AND D.SALES_CD IS NULL)) AND X.ORDRS_SEQ = D.ORDRS_SEQ AND D.COST_NO = #{costNo} WHERE X.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND X.ORDRS_NO = #{ordrsNo} -- AND X.SALES_CD IS NOT NULL ORDER BY X.SALES_CD ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN ${firstIndex} AND ${lastIndex}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SM10D01 ( COST_NO, CO_CD, ORDRS_NO, SALES_CD, CHK_SAVE_CD, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, ORDRS_QTY, ORDRS_AMT, ORDRS_SEQ, ORDRS_RMK ) VALUES ( (SELECT COST_NO FROM TB_SM10M01 WHERE FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey}), #{coCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordrsNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chkSaveCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{ordrsQty, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ordrsAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ordrsSeq}, #{ordrsRmk, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
